Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1969...
Injured on 8/23/1972 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/18/1973 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1975, off Mark Almaraz (DIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/1977, off Antonio Bravo (PG)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Malibu on 8/30/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1979, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Championship with Minnesota in 1979...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/27/1982 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/2/1983 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1984 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
